message.body: do you think I should ask angela to help out or just for equip, audition space leads? and extras. maybe we could use her but also could be too many people?
I registered for the conference awhile ago but never got any sort of confirmation - did you?
ok and we should probly invite people to conference? maybe fb
Hey! Sorry been on a hike. If Angela's available that would be awesome. I asked Ellen this morning about helping or any leads.
I didn't get a confirmation.
Yeah! I think they are supposed to register
oh that's too bad
They can probably come anyway they just won't get a name tag or good
Food
haha no name tag, I'm telling emily and claire, blanking on who else I know
haha yeah jj
jk
Temple peeps!

should we screen with blu-Ray? how many do we have again? lauren is NOT on the same page. are we crazy to think we could make it look packed? will need a lot of extras but we'll also have more control than weekend
Yeah blue ray! We have 5 total.
I don't like Lauren's tone
Ha
I know! she keeps saying how tues will be tricky but that's the day we're shooting!
I hope she's not there.
ME TOO. someone needs to put her in her place, we are not going to have a full crew!!!!!
we could bring brandon
We are going to have a very small busy crew
